pageContext.claim: “And I can tell you, I'm the least racist person there is in the world as far as I'm concerned, and they use it almost when they run out of things to criticize you.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump may not consider himself to be racist. But racist tropes have made their way into Trump’s language on multiple occasions. Most recently, the president tweeted that four Democratic minority Congresswomen — all Americans — should “go back” to where they came from. Washington Post Executive Editor Martin Baron noted in a statement, ”The ‘go back’ trope is deeply rooted in the history of racism in the United States. Therefore, we have concluded that ‘racist’ is the proper term to apply to the language [Trump] used [in his tweets].”
